falstad

Class MazeFileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • falstad.MazeFileWriter

  • public class MazeFileWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides functionality to write a maze configuration to a file in an XML format. The class design is not object-oriented as methods for this particular function are all collected here and not distributed across classes that carry that information, e.g. BSPNode. All methods are static. The XML format is a straightforward enumeration of elements and not particularly sophisticated.
